students_view: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW students_view AS SELECT s.student_id, s.first_name, s.last_name, s.date_of_birth, s.gender, s.email, s.phone, s.address, s.enrollment_date AS student_enrollment_date, e.enrollment_id, e.enrollment_date AS enrollment_date, e.grade, c.course_id, c.course_name, c.course_code, c.credits, c.department, i.instructor_id, i.first_name AS instructor_first_name, i.last_name AS instructor_last_name, i.email AS instructor_email, i.phone AS instructor_phone, p.payment_id, p.amount, p.payment_date, p.payment_method FROM students s LEFT JOIN enrollments e ON s.student_id = e.student_id LEFT JOIN courses c ON e.course_id = c.course_id LEFT JOIN course_instructors ci ON c.course_id = ci.course_id LEFT JOIN instructors i ON ci.instructor_id = i.instructor_id LEFT JOIN payments p ON s.student_id = p.student_id;
